name: Shalini
greetingText: I really want to greet you on this day
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox:
𝐇𝐚𝐩𝐩𝐲 𝐛𝐢𝐫𝐭𝐡𝐝𝐚𝐲 Shalini ..!! 
             ♥️💖🥰
𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐲 𝐛𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐞𝐝 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐡𝐚𝐯𝐞 𝐚 𝐟𝐚𝐛𝐮𝐥𝐨𝐮𝐬 𝐲𝐞𝐚𝐫 𝐚𝐡𝐞𝐚𝐝....
text2: This is not enough for someone like you
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: And finally you exited teen!before me😂!.
